resources.string: Your diet(s) data stays on your device. Nothing will be upload anywhere.
List the authorised ingredients that should appear in green. Example : Apple, Mushroom, Tomatoe... You can complete this list latter.
List the problematic ingredients that should appear in orange. Example : Egg, Fish... You can complete this list latter.
List the unauthorised ingredients that should appear in red. Example : Gluten, Milk, Palm oil, Sugar... You can complete this list latter.
